metric.name: AllRequests
metric.description: The total number of HTTP requests made to an Amazon S3 bucket, regardless of type. If youâ€™re using a metrics configuration with a filter, then this metric only returns the HTTP requests made to the objects in the bucket that meet the filter's requirements.

metric.name: GetRequests
metric.description: The number of HTTP GET requests made for objects in an Amazon S3 bucket. This doesn't include list operations.

metric.name: PutRequests
metric.description: The number of HTTP PUT requests made for objects in an Amazon S3 bucket.

metric.name: DeleteRequests
metric.description: The number of HTTP DELETE requests made for objects in an Amazon S3 bucket. This also includes Delete Multiple Objects requests.

metric.name: HeadRequests
metric.description: The number of HTTP HEAD requests made to an Amazon S3 bucket.

metric.name: PostRequests
metric.description: The number of HTTP POST requests made to an Amazon S3 bucket.

metric.name: ListRequests
metric.description: The number of HTTP requests that list the contents of a bucket.

metric.name: BytesDownloaded
metric.description: The number bytes downloaded for requests made to an Amazon S3 bucket, where the response includes a body.

metric.name: BytesUploaded
metric.description: The number bytes uploaded that contain a request body, made to an Amazon S3 bucket.

metric.name: 4xxErrors
metric.description: The number of HTTP 4xx client error status code requests made to an Amazon S3 bucket with a value of either 0 or 1. The average statistic shows the error rate, and the sum statistic shows the count of that type of error, during each period.

metric.name: 5xxErrors
metric.description: The number of HTTP 5xx server error status code requests made to an Amazon S3 bucket with a value of either 0 or 1. The average statistic shows the error rate, and the sum statistic shows the count of that type of error, during each period.

metric.name: FirstByteLatency
metric.description: The per-request time from the complete request being received by an Amazon S3 bucket to when the response starts to be returned.

metric.name: TotalRequestLatency
metric.description: The elapsed per-request time from the first byte received to the last byte sent to an Amazon S3 bucket. This includes the time taken to receive the request body and send the response body, which is not included in FirstByteLatency.
